description:
This market will resolve according to the winner of the DreamLeague Season 28 tournament, currently scheduled for February 16 to March 1, 2026.

If at any point it becomes impossible for a listed team to win the DreamLeague Season 28 tournament per the rules of the tournament (e.g., a team is eliminated in the playoffs), the corresponding market will resolve to “No”.

If this tournament is postponed after March 31, 2026, 11:59 PM ET, canceled, or a winner has not been declared within this timeframe, this market will resolve to "Other".

If multiple teams are declared the winner, this market will resolve in favor of the team whose listed team name comes first alphabetically.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the tournament organizer, ESL Gaming (https://pro.eslgaming.com/dreamleague); however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.
